title: Grateful Dead Live at Baltimore Civic Center on 1982-04-19
lineage: SHNs were decoded to wave and Audition 3.0 was used to reassemble the tracks back to 1 long wave.  Audition 3.0 was used to align & synch the SBD & AUD sources.  Audition 3.0 used to adjust the volume for AUDs, matrix/CTR and LFE channels.
source: Matrix 2 Source Mix - SBD (shn id 89313) MAC > R1 7.5ips 1/4 track > Technics RS-1506 > Grace designs Lunatec V3 (pre only) > Korg MR-1000 > DSD-DFF 1bit 5.64 Mhz > Audio Gate SW > 24/96 WAV + AUD (shn id 19420) MAC (Taped by Steven Martin, modified Nakamichi CM-700 mics > Sony TC-D5M) > Nak Dragon playback > Cardas audiophile cables > HHB CDR 800 master CD
